item.title: 峰会正与阿斯利康商谈 150 亿美元的合作事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）正在与Summit Therapeutics Inc.讨论一项合作协议，该公司可能会在一段时间内支付高达150亿美元的费用，以获得一种肺癌药物的许可。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc is discussing a partnership deal with Summit Therapeutics Inc. in which it could pay as much as $15 billion over time to license a lung-cancer drug, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度 RBI 计划从银行系统抽走 117 亿美元资金
item.description: 印度央行宣布计划从银行系统中收回过剩的流动性，此举可能是为了遏制近期隔夜借贷成本的下滑。【原文：India’s central bank announced plans to withdraw excess liquidity from the banking system, a move likely aimed at stemming the recent slide in overnight borrowing costs.】

item.title: 债务投资者马博盖特认为私人借款人的痛苦在增加
item.description: 据一家准备出手相救的不良债务公司称，美国私营企业正在失去管理其不断增长的债务负担的空间，这可能会给其直接贷款人带来麻烦。【原文：Private US companies are running out of room to manage their growing debt loads, potentially posing trouble for their direct lenders, according to one distressed-debt firm that is ready to come to the rescue.】

item.title: 摩洛哥货币局局长表示，摩洛哥正在考虑发行多年来首支伊斯兰债券
item.description: 摩洛哥央行行长表示，在为 2030 年男足世界杯进行投资的背景下，摩洛哥可能会在中断七年后于 2025 年出售伊斯兰债券。【原文：Morocco may sell Islamic bonds in 2025 after a seven-year hiatus, the central bank governor said, amid an investment drive for the men’s football World Cup in 2030.】

item.title: 就业放缓，美国服务提供商小幅扩张
item.description: 受商业活动和预订量回升的帮助，美国服务提供商在 6 月份勉强实现了扩张，尽管就业指数出现了三个月来最大程度的萎缩。【原文：US service providers barely expanded in June, helped by a pickup in business activity and bookings even as an index of employment contracted the most in three months.】

item.title: 银行正在剥离奢侈品供应商 Altofare 的部分债务
item.description: 在奢侈品行业的不景气促使奢侈品供应商 Altofare 集团与债权人展开谈判之后，银行正在减少对该集团的风险敞口。【原文：Banks are cutting their exposure to luxury supplier Altofare Group, after a slump in the sector pushed the company to kick off talks with creditors.】

item.title: 冲突后印度批准 123 亿美元国防采购计划
item.description: 在与邻国巴基斯坦发生军事冲突一个月后，印度批准了 123 亿美元的国防采购计划。【原文：India approved $12.3 billion of defense purchases a month after its military confrontation with neighboring Pakistan.】

item.title: 中国公司正在洽谈从巴西进口蒸馏谷物事宜
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商厦门C&D公司正在洽谈从巴西进口蒸馏谷物，因为中国准备开始从这个南美国家采购这种富含蛋白质的饲料原料。【原文：Commodity trader Xiamen C&D Inc. is in talks to import distillers grains from Brazil as China prepares to begin sourcing the protein-rich feed ingredient from the South American nation.】

item.title: 英国央行贝利警告稳定币威胁公众对货币的信任
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）警告说，稳定币的兴起有可能破坏公众对货币的信任，专家们也警告说，美元支持的加密货币的使用范围扩大会带来威胁。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey warned that the rise of stablecoins risks undermining the public’s trust in money as experts warn of the threats posed by the expanded use of dollar-backed cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 格拉平斯基称波兰意外降息并非周期的开始
item.description: 波兰央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）回击了市场日益增长的预期，即周三的意外降息启动了宽松周期。【原文：Poland’s central bank Governor Adam Glapinski pushed back against growing market expectations that a surprise interest rate cut on Wednesday has kicked off an easing cycle.】

item.title: 以下是美国 6 月份就业报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周四公布的美国 6 月份就业报告的主要内容：【原文：Here are key takeaways from the US employment report for June, released Thursday:】

item.title: 美国液化天然气运输水道问题开始引发紧张局势
item.description: 美国最大的液化天然气出口商之一 Venture Global 公司正在就如何与计划中的邻国共享一条共同航道提出疑问；此举凸显了特朗普政府为增加出口而支持的能源行业即将面临的航运空间瓶颈。【原文：One of the US largest exporters of liquefied natural gas, Venture Global Inc., is raising questions over how to share a common waterway with a planned neighbor — it’s a move that underscores a coming bottleneck for shipping space in an energy sector that the Trump administration is supporting for increased exports.】

item.title: 埃及大亨在流行歌星遇害后与英国的损害赔偿要求抗争
item.description: 一位埃及大亨因在 2008 年谋杀黎巴嫩流行歌星一案中的作用而被赦免，现在他面临着伦敦民事诉讼，要求她的前伴侣赔偿数百万美元。【原文：An Egyptian tycoon, pardoned for his role in the 2008 murder of a Lebanese pop star, now faces a London civil bid for millions in compensation from her former partner.】

item.title: 中东冲突是智利 6 月保持利率不变的因素之一
item.description: 智利央行表示，考虑到中东冲突带来的更大不确定性，包括战争对通胀和货币政策影响的疑虑，上个月维持利率不变的决定是最佳选择。【原文：Chile’s central bank said its decision to hold rates last month was the best option given higher uncertainty stemming from the Middle East conflict, including doubts on the war’s impact on inflation and monetary policy.】

item.title: 印度公司的债券销售可能因门户网站升级而受阻
item.description: 随着印度政府对企业用于提交监管文件的在线门户网站进行升级，企业以卢比计价的债券销售可能会在下周放缓几天。【原文：Rupee-denominated bond sales by companies may slowdown for a few days next week as the Indian government upgrades an online portal used by firms to file regulatory documents.】

item.title: 越南仍在敲定特朗普已宣布的贸易协议
item.description: 越南表示，谈判人员仍在努力敲定美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的贸易协议的细节，除了迄今为止披露的关税税率外，几乎没有为企业和投资者提供明确的信息。【原文：Vietnam said negotiators are still working to finalize the details of the trade deal announced by US President Donald Trump, providing little clarity to businesses and investors beyond the tariff rates disclosed so far.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 同意以 20 亿美元收购 Olo 餐饮软件公司
item.description: 餐饮软件供应商 Olo Inc. 将被投资公司 Thoma Bravo 收购，这笔交易对这家总部位于纽约的公司的估值约为 20 亿美元。【原文：Olo Inc., a restaurant software provider, is being acquired by investment firm Thoma Bravo in a deal that values the New York-based company at about $2 billion.】

item.title: 德意志银行重组贷款与咨询业务
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）正在重组其全球发起和咨询业务部门，以简化结构并推动增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is reorganizing its global origination and advisory business division in a move to simplify the structure and drive growth.】

item.title: 评级风险降低，罗马尼亚债券反弹步伐加快
item.description: 罗马尼亚主权债券的投资者对期待已久的控制预算赤字的措施表示欢迎，信用评级下调的风险降低可能会推动该国债务证券进一步反弹。【原文：Investors in Romanian sovereign bonds are welcoming long-awaited measures to curb the budget deficit, with the reduced risk of a credit-rating cut likely to fuel a further rally in the country’s debt securities.】

item.title: 投资者看到了米莱伊结束国有石油公司争夺战的途径
item.description: 在美国针对阿根廷主要石油生产商的数十亿美元的判决中，哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）看到了一线希望：至少在一些投资者看来，这位自由主义领袖有机会最终结束这场旷日持久的法律纠纷。【原文：There is a silver lining for Javier Milei in a multibillion-dollar US judgment targeting Argentina’s main oil producer: At least some investors see the libertarian leader as having a shot at finally putting an end to a long-running legal saga.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德私募股权基金向富人基金出售股份
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德商业合伙公司（Brookfield Business Partners）正计划将其在三家投资组合公司中的部分权益出售给布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）管理的一家面向富人的新私募股权基金。【原文：Brookfield Business Partners is planning to sell part of its interests in three portfolio companies to a new private equity fund for wealthy individuals that will be run by Brookfield Asset Management.】

item.title: 就业数据强劲，债券交易员放弃七月降息押注
item.description: 6 月份的就业报告强于预期，促使交易商放弃对美联储本月降息的押注，国债随之暴跌。【原文：Treasuries tumbled after a stronger-than-expected jobs report for June prompted traders to exit bets on an interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve this month.】

item.title: 薪资增长超预期，美股期货涨幅扩大
item.description: 数据显示就业增长超出预期，提振了投资者对经济健康状况的信心，美国股指期货随之上扬。【原文：US stock futures advanced after data showed job growth exceeded expectations, boosting investors’ confidence in the health of the economy.】

item.title: 加拿大货物贸易逆差因黄金出货量增加而缩小
item.description: 加拿大对美国的出口份额至少降至 1997 年以来的最低水平（不包括科威德大流行），而对其他国家的出口则创下新高。【原文：Canada’s share of exports destined for the US shrank to the smallest proportion since at least 1997, excluding the Covid pandemic, while shipments to other countries reached a new high.】

item.title: 美国薪资增长超出预期，失业率降至 4.1
item.description: 美国 6 月份的就业增长连续第四个月超过预期，失业率也有所下降，这表明尽管经济放缓，但劳动力市场仍在保持稳定。【原文：US job growth exceeded expectations in June for a fourth straight month and the unemployment rate fell, showcasing a labor market that is holding up despite a slowing economy.】

item.title: BBVA 计划将 SRT 与 40 亿欧元企业贷款挂钩
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙对外银行（BBVA SA）正在就与企业贷款相关的重大风险转移问题向投资者征求意见。【原文：BBVA SA is sounding out investors for a significant risk transfer linked to corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国吉利品牌携纯电动和混合动力 SUV 进入意大利市场
item.description: 亿万富翁李书福的吉利汽车控股公司将首次以其同名品牌进入意大利，这将扩大中国汽车制造商在欧洲的扩张。【原文：Billionaire Li Shufu’s Geely Automobile Holdings will enter Italy for the first time with its namesake brand, extending a push by Chinese carmakers to expand in Europe.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Starboard 增持 Tripadvisor 9% 股份
item.description: Starboard Value LP 已持有 Tripadvisor Inc. 9% 的股份，并打算与这家旅游预订和点评网站共同探讨如何释放价值。【原文：Starboard Value LP has built a 9% stake in Tripadvisor Inc. and intends to engage with the travel booking and review site on how to unlock value.】

item.title: 贸易期限临近，特朗普的越南协议引发亚洲担忧
item.description: 越南与美国达成的贸易协议为亚洲各国政府敲响了警钟，它们正在努力应对高关税将继续存在的现实。【原文：Vietnam’s trade deal with the US is a wake-up call for Asian governments grappling with the reality that higher tariffs are here to stay.】

item.title: 古根海姆的沃尔什称美联储现在有降息空间
item.description: 古根海姆合伙人投资管理公司（Guggenheim Partners Investment Management）首席投资官安妮-沃尔什（Anne Walsh）表示，随着不确定性的上升和关税的影响波及整个经济，美联储还有降息的空间。【原文：The Federal Reserve has room to cut interest rates as elevated uncertainty and the impact of tariffs ripple across the economy, said Anne Walsh, chief investment officer of Guggenheim Partners Investment Management.】
